page.title: 02RECREATION-SPORTS CENTRE
page.content: Dunmow Sports Centre is run by Uttlesford Council and it was opened in 1975 it uses some of the comprehensive school's facilities. There are 12 members of staff.There are 7 activities these are squash,hire the hall,badminton,table tennis,tennis gymnasium and swimming.Swimming is the least profitable activity and it has to be subsidised.Squash is the most profitable activity.More people use the facilities during the summer than the winter.The swimming pool measures 18metres by 7metres.It was built in 1966 as an outdoor pool and it was covered in 1971.Dunmow Swimming Club started up in 1980 and it is held on Monday and Thursday nights.There are 4 groups covering ages of 8-16.There are 100 members,the weekly sub is 60p.The club enters galas,each year they hold championships for competition and fun.
